sn22.74:1.2: “Assutava, bhikkhave, puthujjano rupassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.74:1.6: vinnanassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn22.74:1.7: Sutava ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako rupassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati.
sn22.74:1.11: vinnanassa samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam pajanati”ti.
